this_title: VICE Special Report The Future of Work
trans_title: 恶之特别报告：未来的工作
introduction: The next Industrial Revolution is upon us, and scientists, entrepreneurs and policymakers are warning of an imminent paradigm shift in the future of work. In partnership with the Council on Foreign Relations, VICE talks to industry leaders and laborers to learn how radical developments in automation and artificial intelligence are set to change the world of work as we know it.下一轮工业革命即将来临，科学家，企业家和政策制定者都在警告，工作的未来即将发生范式转变。 VICE与对外关系委员会合作，与行业领导者和劳工进行了对话，以了解自动化和人工智能的根本发展将如何改变我们所知道的工作世界。
chinese_title: 恶之特别报告：未来的工作
foreign_title: VICE Special Report The Future of Work
